common.core

Class MouseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • common.core.MouseHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMouseHandler

    public class MouseHandler
extends java.util.Observable
implements IMouseHandler
    Serves as the model for the mouse state which changes from time to time Its hold the mouseState to be notified for changes
